entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
